mapper.select: SELECT /* AppguideThemeMapper.xml, getThemeRecommendInfo, 앱가이드 테마 정보 조회, 윤주영/SK플래닛 , 2014-03-06 */ T.LIST_ID THEME_ID , T.LIST_NM THEME_NM , DECODE(T.IMG_PATH,NULL,2,1) THEME_TYPE , T.IMG_PATH THEME_IMG FROM TB_DP_LIST T WHERE T.TENANT_ID = #{tenantHeader.tenantId} AND T.LIST_ID = #{themeId} AND T.EXPO_YN = 'Y'

SELECT /* AppguideThemeMapper.xml, getBasicThemeRecommendProductList, 앱가이드 테마 추천별 상품 리스트, 윤주영/SK플래닛, 2014-03-06 */ S.* FROM ( SELECT COUNT(*) OVER() AS TOTAL_COUNT , ROWNUM AS RNN , A.PROD_ID , A.SVC_GRP_CD , A.SVC_TYPE_CD , A.CONTENTS_TYPE_CD , A.META_CLSF_CD , A.TOP_MENU_ID , A.MENU_ID , A.PART_PROD_ID , A.RN FROM ( SELECT P2.PROD_ID , P2.SVC_GRP_CD , P2.SVC_TYPE_CD , P2.CONTENTS_TYPE_CD , P2.META_CLSF_CD , P2.TOP_MENU_ID , CP.MENU_ID , P.PROD_ID AS PART_PROD_ID , ROW_NUMBER( ) OVER ( PARTITION BY PR.PROD_ID ORDER BY P.REG_DT DESC ) AS RN FROM TB_DP_LIST A , TB_DP_LIST_PROD AP , TB_DP_PROD_RSHP PR , TB_DP_MENU_CATEGORY_PROD_MAPG CP , TB_DP_PROD P /* EPSD */ , TB_DP_TENANT_PROD TP , TB_DP_PROD P2 /* CHNL */ , TB_DP_TENANT_PROD TP2 WHERE SYSDATE BETWEEN NVL( AP.EXPO_START_DT, SYSDATE ) AND NVL( AP.EXPO_END_DT, SYSDATE ) AND A.TENANT_ID = AP.TENANT_ID AND A.LIST_ID = AP.LIST_ID AND PR.PROD_ID = AP.PROD_ID /* CHNL */ AND CP.PROD_ID = AP.PROD_ID AND P2.PROD_ID = PR.PROD_ID /* CHNL */ AND TP2.TENANT_ID = A.TENANT_ID AND TP2.PROD_ID = P2.PROD_ID AND P.PROD_ID = PR.PART_PROD_ID /* EPSD */ AND TP.TENANT_ID = A.TENANT_ID AND PR.PROD_RSHP_CD = 'DP010802' /* 채널-에피소드 상품 관계 */ AND TP.PROD_ID = P.PROD_ID AND A.LIST_ID = #{themeId} AND A.EXPO_YN = 'Y' AND AP.EXPO_YN = 'Y' AND A.TENANT_ID = #{tenantHeader.tenantId} AND CP.BASE_YN = 'Y' AND CP.USE_YN = 'Y' AND TP.PROD_STATUS_CD = 'PD000403' AND TP2.PROD_STATUS_CD = 'PD000403' AND P2.TOP_MENU_ID <> 'DP02' AND P.TOP_MENU_ID <> 'DP02' AND EXISTS ( SELECT 'X' FROM TB_DP_SPRT_DEVICE SH WHERE SH.PROD_ID = P.PROD_ID AND (SH.DEVICE_MODEL_CD = #{deviceHeader.model} OR SH.DEVICE_MODEL_CD = #{virtualDeviceModel}) ) AND (CASE WHEN P2.TOP_MENU_ID = 'DP13' THEN CASE WHEN #{ebookSprtYn} = 'Y' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END WHEN P2.TOP_MENU_ID = 'DP14' THEN CASE WHEN #{comicSprtYn} = 'Y' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END WHEN P2.TOP_MENU_ID = 'DP15' THEN CASE WHEN #{sclShpgSprtYn} = 'Y' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END WHEN P2.TOP_MENU_ID = 'DP16' THEN CASE WHEN P.META_CLSF_CD = 'CT25' THEN CASE WHEN #{musicSprtYn} = 'Y' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END ELSE 1 END WHEN P2.TOP_MENU_ID IN ('DP17', 'DP18') THEN CASE WHEN #{videoDrmSprtYn} = 'N' THEN CASE WHEN P.DRM_YN ='N' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END ELSE 1 END ELSE 1 END) = 1 ORDER BY AP.EXPO_ORD_ALWAYS_YN DESC , AP.EXPO_ORD, AP.EXPO_ORD_SUB, P2.REG_DT DESC ) A WHERE RN = 1 ) S WHERE RNN BETWEEN #{START_ROW} AND #{END_ROW}

SELECT /* AppguideThemeMapper.xml, getThemeRecommendMainList, 앱가이드 테마추천 메인 테마 추천 아이디 리스트, 윤주영/SK플래닛 , 2014-05-23 */ /*+ LEADING(A) USE_NL(A AP) */ DISTINCT A.LIST_ID FROM TB_DP_LIST A , TB_DP_LIST_PROD AP WHERE SYSDATE BETWEEN NVL( A.EXPO_START_DT, SYSDATE ) AND NVL( A.EXPO_END_DT, SYSDATE ) AND A.TENANT_ID = AP.TENANT_ID AND A.LIST_ID = AP.LIST_ID AND A.TENANT_ID = #{tenantHeader.tenantId} AND A.LIST_GRP_CD = #{listGrpCd} AND A.EXPO_YN = 'Y' AND AP.EXPO_YN = 'Y'
